item.title: Christina add a quote by Robyn Carr
item.description: "Muriel, you're not a convenience. I'd walk across a mile of cut glass in my bare feet to hold your hand and talk to you for one hour. You're everything to me.--Walt" -- Robyn Carr

item.title: Christina add a quote by Susan Mallery
item.description: "I know that's an endorsement I've been waiting for," Skye added. "Perfectly adequate in bed. They should make that into a T-shirt" -- Susan Mallery

item.title: Christina add a quote by Susan Mallery
item.description: "How lovely." The old lady sighed. "An office romance. I always wanted an office romance. Of course I never really had a job, which made the situation more challenging. Oh, I worked on an assembly line during World War II, but there weren't very many men around and as my husband was off serving his country, an office romance would have been unpatriotic, don't you think?--Mrs. Ford" -- Susan Mallery

item.title: Christina add a quote by Shana Abe
item.description: "I heard what you said. I’m not the silly romantic you think. I don’t want the heavens or the shooting stars. I don’t want gemstones or gold. I have those things already. I want…a steady hand. A kind soul. I want to fall asleep, and wake, knowing my heart is safe. I want to love, and be loved." -- Shana Abe

item.title: Christina add a quote by Jude Deveraux
item.description: "My soul will find yours." -- Jude Deveraux

item.title: Christina add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Is that a bulletproof vest? See, now that's so insulting. That's like saying I'm not smart enough to shoot you in the head." Eddie DeChooch" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Christina add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Life isn't finding shelter in the storm. It's about learning to dance in the rain." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Christina add a quote by Rachel Caine
item.description: "Damn, Claire. Warn a guy before you do a face-plant on the floor next time. I could have looked all heroic and caught you or something -Shane" -- Rachel Caine

item.title: Christina add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "I was dead until you found me, though I breathed. I was sightless, though I could see. And then you came...and I was awakened." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Christina add a quote by Rachel Caine
item.description: "Perv." He pointed to himself. "Male and eighteen. What's your point?" -- Rachel Caine

item.title: Christina add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "Welcome to the wonderful world of jealousy, he thought. For the price of admission, you get a splitting headache, a nearly irresistable urge to commit murder, and an inferiority complex. Yippee." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Christina add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Take no heed of her.... She reads a lot of books." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Christina add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I don't suffer from my insanity -- I enjoy every minute of it." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Christina add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "I'm saying that I'm a moody, insecure, narrow-minded, jealous, borderline homicidal bitch, and I want you to promise me that you're okay with that, because it's who I am, and you're what I need." -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Christina add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Love sucks. Sometimes it feels good. Sometimes it's just another way to bleed." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Christina add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "You've won the evolutionary lottery: You're a vampire. Let's go to Disneyland!" -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Christina add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Maybe they know what I know, that the true way to a man's heart is six inches of metal between his ribs. Sometimes four inches will do the job, but to be really sure, I like to have six." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Christina add a quote by Rachel Caine
item.description: "Want to play baseball?’” she asked. Shane’s eyes opened, and he stopped stroking her hair. “What?’” “First base,’” she said. “You’re already there.’” “I’m not running the bases.’” “Well, you could at least steal second.’” “Jeez, Claire. I used to distract myself with sports stats at times like these, but now you’ve gone and ruined it." -- Rachel Caine

item.title: Christina add a quote by Rachel Caine
item.description:
"I'm gonna kill him," Eve said, or at least that was what it sounded like filtered through the pillow. Stake him right in the heart, shove garlic up his ass, and-and-"
And what?" (Michael)
When did you get home?" Claire demanded.
Apparently just in time to hear my funeral plans. I especially like the garlic up the ass. It's...different." -- Rachel Caine

item.title: Christina add a quote by Patricia Briggs
item.description: "I don't like it when I outweigh my men." -- Patricia Briggs

item.title: Christina add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Sookie, my little bullet-sucker" Eric, my big bullshitter" -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Christina add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "I don't like having feelings," Eric said coldly, and he left. That was a tough exit line to top." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Christina add a quote by Kelley Armstrong
item.description: "You forget, darling. I <i>am</i> the local psychopath." -- Kelley Armstrong

item.title: Christina add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Before I knew you, I thought brave was not being afraid. You've taught me that bravery is being terrified and doing it anyway." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Christina add a quote by Patricia Briggs
item.description: "MS. THOMPSON, it said in heavy block letters, PLEASE KEEP YOUR FELINE OFF MY PROPERTY. IF I SEE IT AGAIN, I WILL EAT IT." -- Patricia Briggs

item.title: Christina add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Old enough to know better, pissed enough not to care. (Jaden)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Christina add a quote by J.R. Ward
Christina add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "I no longer believed in the idea of soul mates, or love at first sight. But I was beginning to believe that a very few times in your life, if you were lucky, you might meet someone who was exactly right for you. Not because he was perfect, or because you were, but because your combined flaws were arranged in a way that allowed two separate beings to hinge together." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Christina add a quote by Christine Feehan
item.description: "Life gives us choices. You either grab on with both hands and just go for it, or you sit on the sidelines." -- Christine Feehan

item.title: Christina add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "My professional aspirations were simple - I wanted to be an intergalactic princess." -- Janet Evanovich
